Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at W New York places you in the heart of New York, minutes from St. Patrick's Cathedral and close to Chrysler Building. This 4-star hotel is close to Grand Central Terminal and Rockefeller Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 696 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St. Patrick's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Chrysler Building - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Sony Wonder Technology Lab - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
NBC Studios - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Grand Central Terminal - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Rockefeller Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Television and Radio - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Top of the Rock Observation Deck - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dahesh Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
American Folk Art Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Modern Art - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tiffany & Co. - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
United Nations Headquarters - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Radio City Music Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tramway Plaza - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi

The preferred airport for W New York is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to W New York are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi

The preferred airport for W New York is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Room 1
From 2013-03-05 To 2030-12-31
Child policy
Persons under the age of twenty-one (21) are not permitted to stay.They have to stay with another person over the the age of twenty-one (21).

From 2016-09-14 To 2030-12-31
Stay Conditions
There is a restriction on stays longer than 28 day in New York City. Clients will not be able to make bookings for any longer than this.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

The hotel charges a deposit of $ 150, per night, on the guest's credit or debit card, at the time of check-in, for additional charges.<br><br>This hotel charges a resort fee that must be paid at the hotel at check in of $25.00 USD, per night plus tax, for each guestroom which includes the following: $30 Living Room Bar Credit Enhanced WiFi and Local/Long Distance/International Calling $30 Laundry Service Credit (2) Citi bike passes per Day

No changes or amendments are allowed to this booking once confirmed. If date/name/pax configuration changes required post booking, then this will need to be cancelled subject to terms and a new booking made subject to price available at time of re-booking

Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for a maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to the hotel.Please be advised that if booking for 3 or more guests, there is an extra person fee not included in the rate and this is to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival. Beginning August 15 2018, all new reservations will incur destination fee charge of approximately $28.69 per room day, payable directly at the property. The fee includes following services: ? $30 Living Room Bar Credit ? Enhanced WiFi and Local/Long Distance/International Calling ? $30 Laundry Service Credit ? (2) Citi bike passes per Day Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: **Please be advised there is a fee for early departures.** **At check in all guests will be required to present a Major Credit Card for incidentals.** The Destination Fee is an additional service fee charged to every guest, intended to provide ease of access to multiple hotel amenities while making it seamless to enjoy them. Beginning Wednesday August 15th, 2018 – every new reservation will incur a $25.00 fee plus taxes (per room / per night) as a “Destination Fee”. The following is included for the guest: · $30 Living Room Bar Credit · Enhanced WiFi and Local/Long Distance/International Calling · $30 Laundry Service Credit · (2) Citi bike passes per Day

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: In case of early departure, 100% will be charged. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. EXTRA BED ON REQUEST. Baby Cot is upon availability. Facility Fee to be paid by the guest directly at the hotel. Guest is responsible for all incidental charges. A hold of $150 per night will placed on the guest’s credit card or debit card at time of check for incidentals. ***IMPORTANT NOTE*** The Destination Fee is an additional service fee charged to every guest, intended to provide ease of access to multiple hotel amenities while making it seamless to enjoy them. Beginning Wednesday August 15th, 2018 – every new reservation will incur a $25.00 fee plus taxes (per room / per night) as a “Destination Fee”. The following is included for the guest: • $30 Living Room Bar Credit • Enhanced WiFi and Local/Long Distance/International Calling • $30 Laundry Service Credit • (2) Citi bike passes per Day
